features: Internal Grooves Prevent Spillage: The Handheld Dustpan features internal grooves and a barrier strip 1/3 of the way around the edge of the dustpan to prevent dust, debris, dirt, and crumbs from falling out as they are swept inside. Mini broom and dustpan set is deep from outside to inside and shallow to deep.

Built-in Scraper：The hand broom dustpan set brush is shaped for easy sweeping from above and reaching corners, with a built-in scraper and comb/teeth for easy broom cleaning into a dustpan, and just pull the teeth to clean pet hair and human hair.

Small Dustpan and Brush Set Application: This mini dustpan and brush set is perfect for cleaning cat litter, collecting crumbs, and organizing your workspace, sweeping crumbs, small spills, coffee grounds, leftovers, and small debris from countertops and tables.

Convenient Storage: Simple snap feature allows the mini broom brush to lock into the dustpan handle, creating a compact nesting design that's easy to store together and store in one place for aesthetics and space saving! Both thehandheld broom and dustpan handles have a hole for easy hanging.

Medium Size: Small broom and dustpan total dimensions are 14 inches x 9 inches x 4 inches,can be efficiently stored in cabinets,drawers and closets when not in use,brush and dustpan set make your housework easier,if you have any questions about the cleaning tools,please feel free to let us know,we will reply within 24 hours.
body.description: Effortlessly maintain a sparkling clean home with our selection of cleaning essentials. Ideal for quick cleaning of spaces like the kitchen, bathroom or car This whisk broom and dustpan set is great for camping to clean out the tent. It's small enough to keep in the bag with the tent between uses and during the off-season. Great value and quality. This mini broom and dustpan set is perfect for cleaning cat litter. Dustpan & brush set are designed to get into all edges and corners for efficient cleaning. Brush snaps into dustpan for easy storage Convenient hanging hole great for taking camping, cleaning RVs and college dorms

Your suggestions and affirmation are our best return, each of our products after repeated market research and careful selection, give us a chance, you will look forward to our next cooperation. It's small enough to keep in the bag with the tent between uses and during the off-season. Great value and quality. This mini broom and dustpan set is perfect for cleaning cat litter. Dustpan & brush set are designed to get into all edges and corners for efficient cleaning. Brush snaps into dustpan for easy storage Convenient hanging hole great for taking camping, cleaning RVs and college dorms
Convenient hang-up feature for easy storage

small dust pan teeth The grooves on the dustpan allow you to drag the brush to remove dust, hair, and anything else that tends to stay on the brush. Edge with slope The pan seals well to the floor. Because the mini dust pan is angled just right, even the tiniest crumbs are collected without slipping underneath. Multi-layer bristles The brushes themselves in this handheld broom are thick and lush and nothing escapes them.

Drawer cleaning The angle of the brush and the round shape of the brush head make it easy to reach even in corners and smaller spaces. Window sill cleaning Flexible lip conforms to surfaces for efficient cleaning. Desktop cleaning Help clean your desktop clutter, dust around the edges and corners with our Desktop Sweeper! Sofa cleaning Ideal for quick cleaning of spaces like the kitchen, bathroom or car. Drawer cleaning Window sill cleaning Desktop cleaning Sofa cleaning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jiffy clean up.
reviews.reviewText: Very compact for storing. We live in an apartment, compact!Simply cleans dry crumbs etc in a jiffy😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works for my needs
reviews.reviewText: I use this this sweeping up small messes and to get into tight spaces. I raise composting worms and the process can be messy since it’s on a medium level in our basement and one bedroom. The broom gets in the tight spaces under bins, around shelving and such.The bristles are firm enough to actually get most of the dirt on the first pass, unlike one I bought at WallyWorld. The dustpan sits flush on the floor without an annoying gap so it catches most of the dirt and dust.The bristles are a bit too stiff to use on a computer like the picture shows. If this is your intended purpose then the cheap soft bristles on the WallyWorld version might work better, or even a paint brush would be better since firm bristles may scratch up keys and shove the dust under the keys.Overall worth the sale price I paid, which was less than half normal. Not sure I’d pay the full price, but good price during a lightning deal.Overall a good little broom and dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small clean up
reviews.reviewText: I don’t always need a broom and dustpan. Sometimes I just need a little brush to sweep up little messes that are made so this is always the perfect ideal thing for me to keep right next to the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice weight and size for small spills, steps etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, but good for saving space.
reviews.reviewText: It's plain and simple with no gimmicks or anything crazy in particular.But it works as a dust pan normally should work and it's easy to store away and pretty compact which is nice for keeping it out of sight and out of mind as well as just for freeing up more space in a home office or retreat.I like that the accompanying brush can be fit into the dust pan and they can both be put away together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent mini dustpan
reviews.reviewText: Simple no-frills mini dust pan. Great for cleaning around a small area like near a pet cage. It's all made of plastic but the plastic feels thick and sturdy. The bristles are also decently stiff. For it's intended purpose, this does the job with no issues. And for something so simple, there are several unexpected features such as the scraper at the end of the brush, hanging holes, saw ridges along the edge of the dustpan to filter clean the bristles (Though I wish the teeth were deeper to really filter through the bristles).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for mini messes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just The Size I Needed
reviews.reviewText: I have many other dustpans and they all do pretty much the same thing, however, it was hard for me to find one that was the right size to keep at my desk. I make lots of paracord lanyards everyday and always have little bits and pieces of paracord on my desk, under my keyboard, and basically everywhere all around me. I needed a smaller sized dustpan that I can keep on my desk to make it easier to clean up my mess when I'm done working. This was exactly what I needed and I love that I can clip the brush right onto the dustpan itself and store them together on a small footprint on my desk. If you need a small dustpan to use at your desk like I do, this is for you!
